dmca.title: [EV1-C1435393V] H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 18, 2006 10:45 PM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1435393V] H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements Subject: [EV1-C1435393V] H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C1435393V] H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements Reference: [EV1-C1435393V] For your review. -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx http://www.ev1.net/english/about/aup.asp http://www.ev1.net/english/about/tos.asp ==== Original Message ==== 1. Thu, 19 Oct 2006 03:37:46 -0500 (CDT) Received: from PPWEB3@aol.com by imo-m24.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v38_r7.6.) id x.38a.d839dca (48600) for ; Thu, 19 Oct 2006 04:37:29 -0400 (EDT) From: PPWEB3@aol.com Message-ID: <38a.d839dca.32689349@aol.com> Date: Thu, 19 Oct 2006 04:37:29 EDT X-ASG-Orig-Subj: H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements Subject: H#060 VILLAGE PEOPLE / "NAZI YMCA" - Hosted On-line Infringements To: abuse@ev1servers.net MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="-----------------------------1161247049" X-Mailer: 9.0 SE for Windows sub 5019 X-Spam-Flag: NO X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: PPWEB3@aol.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 19 Oct 2006 08:37:46.0826 (UTC) FILETIME=[DA63F2A0:01C6F359] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Web Sheriff Protecting Your Rights on the Internet Tel 44-(0)208-323 8013 / Fax 44-(0)208-323 8080 websheriff@websheriff.com SUMMARY DMCA NOTIFICATION 1. Rights Owner : CAN'T STOP PRODUCTIONS INC. 2. Rights Agent : WEB SHERIFF 3. Infringed Rights : COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK & GOODWILL 4. Infringed Artist : VILLAGE PEOPLE 5. Infringed Title : "YMCA" 6. Infringing Activity : AVI DOWNLOADING & ILLEGAL SYNC'ING 7. Infringing Web Address : _www._ (http://www.blogtelevision.net) blogtelevision.net 8. Infringing File Location : _http://www.blogtelevision.net/p/Videos-Watch-a-Video___1,2,,41651.html_ (http://www.blogtelevision.net/p/Videos-Watch-a-Video___1,2,,41651.html) 9. Signature: Deborah Sykes, on behalf of Web Sheriff Ltd. Note : The information in the notification is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, Web Sheriff is authorised to act on behalf of the exclusive owner of the rights alleged to have been infringed in this Notification. FULL / LEGAL NOTIFICATION Dear Sirs, Please be advised that Web Sheriff represents Can't Stop Productions Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "CSP") in relation to - inter alia - the above matter. Please be further advised that our said clients own or otherwise control the international trademark VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Trademark), together with the copyright in the various master recordings commercially recorded by the VILLAGE PEOPLE, including, but not limited to, the master recording entitled "YMCA" (hereinafter referred to as the "Masters"), together with the copyright in the musical compositions variously recorded by the VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Compositions"), together with the goodwill in and associated with the business trading under the name VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Goodwill)". We understand that your company (a) would appear to be the registered host of the so-called 'website' specified in our SUMMARY NOTIFICATION above trading from the so-called 'domain' specified in our SUMMARY NOTIFICATION above (hereinafter referred to as the "Infringing Site") and (b) would appear to have utilised the Infringing Site to trade by usage of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill without the authority or permission of our client. The said activities are a clear and flagrant breach of - inter alia - our client's proprietary rights in and to the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill. In consequence of the foregoing - and in order to mitigate the serious and on-going damage suffered by our client - we would ask you to immediately comply with the following instructions:- 1. All trading using the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must cease. 2. All other exploitation and / or use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must cease including, but not limited to, so-called 'downloading' and / or so-called 'streaming' from the Infringing Site (as applicable). 3. Final accounts relating to all income derived pursuant to your use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must be prepared and furnished to our clients together with all monies thereby shown to have been earned by such activities. 4. All relevant, so-called 'rights collection societies' must be paid in full for the mechanical reproduction and / or public performance of the Masters, the Compositions and all other copyright works (as applicable) pursuant to your aforementioned activities. 5. Your domestic and overseas licensees and / or distributors and / or associates and / or band-width providers (as applicable) must be notified of the foregoing and must likewise be obliged to comply with the instructions herein contained. 6. You must undertake to take out a half-page advertisements in Billboard Magazine, Music Week Magazine and Music & Media Magazine within fourteen (14) days of the date hereof clarifying the fact that (a) your usage of Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill was not authorised by or otherwise associated with our client, (b) the services offered by you under the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill were not offered by or on behalf of our client and (c) you are no longer trading either under or otherwise by use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill. Furthermore, the said advertisement must include an apology to our client. 7. You must undertake to execute such documentation as may be reasonably required by our client in order to give proper effect to the instructions contained herein. In addition to the foregoing - and in accordance with recent US & UK judicial rulings in favour of the RIAA and BPI respectively - we would ask you to provide us by return with substantive details of the means by which you propose to compensate our clients for the clear and flagrant breaches of our client's intellectual property rights in the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill. In this regard we would highlight the fact that our clients have invested heavily in the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill over a period of four (4) decades and, moreover, that you have illegally synchronised the Masters and the Compositions with images of Adolf Hitler and the Third Reich, which our client not only finds deeply offensive, but which is also seriously damaging to the Goodwill : as such, any proposals for compensation must seek to both address and redress the same. Should you be unwilling or otherwise unable to comply with the foregoing, we must ask you provide the name and address of the US attorneys, UK solicitors and (as applicable) the domestic lawyers whom you intend to instruct in relation to this matter for the purposes of accepting the service of such proceedings as our appointed litigators would issue against - inter alia - yourselves on behalf of our clients in such an event. Should we fail to hear from you in this regard, such proceedings would then be served directly upon your trading premises / registered offices / residential address (as applicable). Whilst writing, we would also caution you against 'posting' or otherwise communicating any correspondence and / or remarks to third parties which could in any way be construed as being defamatory of any officers of our client or which could otherwise constitute a malicious falsehood injurious to our client's business. Notwithstanding the foregoing, all rights of Can't Stop Productions Inc. and the Village People - including, but not limited to, the right to apply for injunctive relief without further notice or recourse to you, the right to seek exemplary / punitive damages and the right to cite further infringements of our client's intellectual property rights by you - are hereby strictly reserved. Yours faithfully, Deborah Sykes for and on behalf of WEB SHERIFF MIME element (text/html)

Web Sheriff
Protecting Your Rights on the Internet
Tel 44-(0)208-323 8013 / Fax 44-(0)208-323 8080
websheriff@websheriff.com

SUMMARY DMCA NOTIFICATION

  1. Rights Owner :  CAN'T STOP PRODUCTIONS INC.

  2. Rights Agent :  WEB SHERIFF

  3. Infringed Rights :  COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK & GOODWILL

  4. Infringed Artist :  VILLAGE PEOPLE

  5. Infringed Title :  "YMCA"

  6. Infringing Activity :  AVI DOWNLOADING & ILLEGAL SYNC'ING

  7. Infringing Web Address : www.< /A>blogtelevision.net

  ; 8. Infringing File Location :  http://www.blogtelevision.net/p/Videos-Watch-a-Video___1,2,,41651 .html

  9. Signature:  Deborah Sykes, on behalf of Web Sheriff Ltd.

Note :
The information in the notification is accurate and,
under penalty of perjury, Web Sheriff is authorised to
act on behalf of the exclusive owner of the rights
alleged to have been infringed in this Notification.

FULL / LEGAL NOTIFICATION

  Dear Sirs,

  Please be advised that Web Sheriff represents Can't Stop Productions Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "CSP") in relation to - inter alia - the above matter.

  Please be further advised that our said clients own or otherwise control the international trademark VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Trademark), together with the copyright in the various master recordings commercially recorded by the VILLAGE PEOPLE, including, but not limited to, the master recording entitled "YMCA" (hereinafter referred to as the "Masters"), together with the copyright in the musical compositions variously recorded by the VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Compositions"), together with the goodwill in and associated with the business trading under the name VILLAGE PEOPLE (hereinafter referred to as the "Goodwill)".

  We understand that your company (a) would appear to be the registered host of the so-called 'website' specified in our SUMMARY NOTIFICATION above trading from the so-called 'domain' specified in our SUMMARY NOTIFICATION above (hereinafter referred to as the "Infringing Site") and (b) would appear to have utilised the Infringing Site to trade by usage of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill without the authority or permission of our client. The said activities are a clear and flagrant breach of - inter alia - our client's proprietary rights in and to the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill.

  In consequence of the foregoing - and in order to mitigate the serious and on-going damage suffered by our client - we would ask you to immediately comply with the following instructions:-

  1. All trading using the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must cease.

  2. All other exploitation and / or use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must cease including, but not limited to, so-called 'downloading' and / or so-called 'streaming' from the Infringing Site (as applicable).

  3. Final accounts relating to all income derived pursuant to your use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill must be prepared and furnished to our clients together with all monies thereby shown to have been earned by such activities.

  4. All relevant, so-called 'rights collection societies' must be paid in full for the mechanical reproduction and / or public performance of the Masters, the Compositions and all other copyright works (as applicable) pursuant to your aforementioned activities.

  5. Your domestic and overseas licensees and / or distributors and / or associates and / or band-width providers (as applicable) must be notified of the foregoing and must likewise be obliged to comply with the instructions herein contained.

  6. You must undertake to take out a half-page advertisements in Billboard Magazine, Music Week Magazine and Music & Media Magazine within fourteen (14) days of the date hereof clarifying the fact that (a) your usage of Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill was not authorised by or otherwise associated with our client, (b) the services offered by you under the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill were not offered by or on behalf of our client and (c) you are no longer trading either under or otherwise by use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill. Furthermore, the said advertisement must include an apology to our client.

  7. You must undertake to execute such documentation as may be reasonably required by our client in order to give proper effect to the instructions contained herein.

  In addition to the foregoing - and in accordance with recent US & UK judicial rulings in favour of the RIAA and BPI respectively - we would ask you to provide us by return with substantive details of the means by which you propose to compensate our clients for the clear and flagrant breaches of our client's intellectual property rights in the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill. In this regard we would highlight the fact that our clients have invested heavily in the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill over a period of four (4) decades and, moreover, that you have illegally synchronised the Masters and the Compositions with images of Adolf Hitler and the Third Reich, which our client not only finds deeply offensive, but which is also seriously damaging to the Goodwill : as such, any proposals for compensation must seek to both address and redress the same.

  Should you be unwilling or otherwise unable to comply with the foregoing, we must ask you provide the name and address of the US attorneys, UK solicitors and (as applicable) the domestic lawyers whom you intend to instruct in relation to this matter for the purposes of accepting the service of such proceedings as our appointed litigators would issue against - inter alia - yourselves on behalf of our clients in such an event. Should we fail to hear from you in this regard, such proceedings would then be served directly upon your trading premises / registered offices / residential address (as applicable).

  Whilst writing, we would also caution you against 'posting' or otherwise communicating any correspondence and / or remarks to third parties which could in any way be construed as being defamatory of any officers of our client or which could otherwise constitute a malicious falsehood injurious to our client's business.

  Notwithstanding the foregoing, all rights of Can't Stop Productions Inc. and the Village People - including, but not limited to, the right to apply for injunctive relief without further notice or recourse to you, the right to seek exemplary / punitive damages and the right to cite further infringements of our client's intellectual property rights by you - are hereby strictly reserved.

  Yours faithfully,
 
  Deborah Sykes
  for and on behalf of
  WEB SHERIFF
